name: VROOMO
slogan: Taking it 21st century.. Reinventing the way cars change homes with our online marketplace
description:
Vroomo replaces the used car salesman and the used car lot with a platform that connects buyers and sellers in a 21st century way. No haggling, no trips to the dealer or costly multiple trips to sellers homes, no expensive surprises – and no commission to the guy with the nice suit. Which means a better price for everyone.

If you're selling your car – just give us a few details and we will provide you with an immediate private price. We send an independent certified inspector to inspect your car at your home or workplace, finalize the private price, and – once it's sold we will deliver it to its new home. Plus, you will always get a higher offer than  the dealership.

If you're buying a Vroomo certified car –You get a car that has gone through a thorough 240 point independent check and has a clean history. You get a 7 day test drive - with free drive-away insurance-allowing you to return the vehicle within the 7 days for a full refund.

jobs.title: Social/Content Manager
jobs.description:
VROOMO is a revolutionary used car buying & selling platform in Europe. We are at the forefront of the ever changing auto marketplace and especially the influence of technology in this space.  We are experiencing exceptional growth and are looking for superstars to join our team.

 
We are looking for a self-motivated, organised and proactive Social Media & Content Manager to take ownership of and drive our social media and online community activities. We’re looking for a socially savvy digital native who can manage our day-to-day social media across all social channels.



Responsibilities:

Own and drive social media to achieve growth of channels, engagement and action
Ensure social media activity is aligned with overall marketing objectives
Plan, create and schedule engaging and dynamic content to drive engagement
Create engaging content of various formats such as articles and graphics
Develop influencer outreach programme across multiple social media channels
Real-time monitoring of social media channels, engaging and responding to new and existing conversations
Research new trends and techniques to identify potential opportunities
Regular reporting on performance
Help support our Customer Support function with phone calls& emails.
Report directly to the Marketing Director
 

You:

Must have some interest in consumer welfare & at least a basic knowledge of what purpose the clutch serves in a car.
Proactive, organised & super creative
Proven experience using social media management tools for scheduling, listening and analysis
Ability to understand social data to provide insight and recommendations
Excellent communication skills with a flair for the creative (yet precise)
Demonstrate knowledge and experience mastering the latest social media technologies
Proficient knowledge of Photoshop, Illustrator and similar software
Outgoing and social by nature, with a team player mindset
Can provide examples of social and content work
And are awesome!
